Title: Louder Than Words
Writer: Farhad Safinia (creator), Dee Johnson, Angelina Burnett (executive story editor), Kevin J. Hynes (story)
Actors: Candace Edwards, Kelsey Grammer, Connie Nielsen, Hannah Ware
Plot: Tom Kane cements his mayoral legacy with a lavish ceremony celebrating the groundbreaking of the new modernized O'Hare terminals. Now Kane looks to the future, setting his sights on ...
